title: hostmaria
author: hostmaria
content: Pay with your favourite layer 1 coins for feature-loaded budget Cloud hosting.SSD Business Plan: https://www.hostmaria.com/cart.php?gid=1&pid=1What you get: 100 GB of space, 1 TB of traffic, unlimited domains, unlimited emails, unlimited free SSLs, 1-click scripts, daily backups, SSD cloud hosting, and more..Price: the normal price is $24.50/yearBefore ordering, please open a support ticket @ https://www.hostmaria.com/submitticket.php and make sure you can pay with your favorite coin > I will accept most layer 1 coins.HostMaria works in partnership with 20i and provides a new generation of web hosting -- otherwise known as 'true cloud.'The cloud data center is one of the best in the UK and it only uses top-quality branded hardware that’s fully stress-tested.HostMaria’s cloud load-balancing and 100% SSD autoscaling servers mean that you get ultimate performance, no matter how your web traffic fluctuates. (NOTE: A free domain name is NOT included in the offer.)Get access to HostMaria today!Best for: Developers, WordPress enthusiasts, and anyone who wants more from their web hostingYou can look up reviews: https://uk.trustpilot.com/review/hostmaria.comalso at AppSumo: https://appsumo.com/products/hostmaria/#reviewsJust open a ticket and we will find a solution Best wishes!Helmutsp.s. Important: Good websites only! .. no DMCA, trademark violations, and, no adult industry stuff.
